data.title: Kraftwerk
data.meta_description: 1968 July 1968 Creamcheese, Dusseldorf, GER (first gig) Fall 1968 Dum Dum, Dusseldorf, GER 1969 January ?, 1969 Jazzkeller, Krefeld, GER (They played a concert a month here throughout 1969) February ?, 1969 Jazzkeller, Krefeld, GER March ?, 1969 Jazzkeller, Krefeld, GER April ?, 1969 Jazzkeller...
